Translations.Text: My rozdilyly yikh u dvanadtsyatʹ tribal spilʹnoty, ta my nadykhnuly Moses koly yoho lyudy poprosyly yoho dlya vody: "Vrazyty skelyu z vashym personalom," whereupon dvanadtsyatʹ pruzhyn khlynutykh zvidty. Otzhe, kozhna spilʹnota znala yoho vodu. Ta my shaded yim z khmaramy, ta poslanymy vnyz yim manna ta quails: "Z'yizhte z harnykh rechey my yakshcho dlya vas." Tse - ne ny shcho vony obrazyly; tse - vony kotri obrazyly yikhni vlasni dushi

Vidklykannya shcho vony buly kazani, "Idutʹ u tse misto prozhyty, ta hostyatʹsya zvidty tomu shcho vy budʹ laska, obrobitʹ lyudey amicably, ta vnosyte vorota humbly. My todi prostymo vashi porushennya. My pomnozhymo vynahorodu dlya spravedlyvu
Ale z·hubni sered nykh zaminyly inshi komandy dlya komand danykh yim. Otzhe, my poslaly na osud yikh z neba, vnaslidok yikhnʹoho wickedness

Nahaduyutʹ yim spilʹnoty bilya morya, khto desecrated Sabbath. Koly vony zauvazhyly Sabbath, rybu prybuly yim abundantly. Ta koly vony porushyly Sabbath, ryba ne prybuvala. My takym chynom afflicted yim, yak naslidok yikhnʹoho porushennya
